token.Na Stone, a regra é fazer diferente para: At Stone, the rule is to do things differently to solve challenges, build big things and impact the payments market, which is responsable for 17% of Brazilian GDP.
token.Somos uma fintech que vem crescendo em r: We are a fintech that has been growing at a strong pace and assuming large missions. With that, we are no longer a startup, we are becoming a great company.
token.Apesar de não sermos mais uma startup, s: Although we are not a startup anymore, we continue with our disruptive culture of innovation and risk-taking; and with our purpose to transform the way entrepreneurship is seen and done in our country.
token.Temos uma base forte de investidores e p: We have a strong base of investors and professionals with more than 16 years of experience at the payments market. In the last 2 years, we grew 15X our team, almost 1.500X our portofolio of clientes and __X our invoicing.
token.Os aprovados no Experienced Stone Progra: Those approved at the Experienced Stone Program will work 3 months in a specific project. During this time, they will receive follow-up from the directors and, at the end of the project, a leadership role based on personal interest and skills.
token.Com o grande crescimento e os desafios q: Along with the great growth and challenges we´ve faced, we seek above-average professionals to take part int the construction of our areas and support decision making.
token.Assim como os profissionais que buscamos: Just like the professionals we seek, we have exceptional people with international academic background, who
token.tem nos ajudado a construir um negócio g: are helping us build a great business of reference. Get to know a little bit of their stories:
token.A Stone é uma adquirente de cartão de cr: Stone is a 100% Brazilian credit card acquirer, with a disruptive approach to the market and innovative products in a segment dominated by big banks.
token.Oferecemos um pacote completo de serviço: We offer a full package of payments services to merchants so they can process their transactions and increase their conversion rates. All that within a smart, personal and specialized attendance.
token.André estudou Economia no Insper e segui: André studied economics at Insper and followed the expected path as an analyst in financial institutions and in a family business. He chose to take an MBA from Darden Business School to align his passions for finance and technology. It was there that he met Stone, identified himself with the company's value culture and got surprised by the people he met. Today he is one of those who helps to solve the challenges of the financial area.
token.Lia se graduou em Física e fez doutorado: Lia graduated in Physics and made a Ph.D. from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), where she studied for seven years. In the middle of her studies, she realized that she no longer wanted an academic career and started looking for opportunities to enter the industry. She worked six years in a large strategic consultancy and the following five in a family office. It was in this last experience that she met the founders of Arpex and ended up coming to Stone, where today  leads the team of Planning and Projects.
token.Marília é formada em Economia no Mackenz: Marília holds a degree in Economics from Mackenzie and went on a trip to California to study Corporate Policy, where she met the innovation and entrepreneurship course Stanford Ignite, in which she participated in the first class in Brazil. After it, she worked six years in the Merge & Acquisiton (Mergers & Acquisitions) area and made deals with professionals and companies from the United States and Europe. She even lived in Mexico for some years. She met and chose Stone at the first place because of her interest in the payment market. Then, she was delighted by the team she found here.
token.Thaylan fez Administração pela Universid: Thaylan studied Administration at the Federal University of Paraná (UFPR) and Economy at PUC of Paraná in search of joining both perspectives of the company and the market. Once graduated, he joined a large Brazilian beverage company, where he spent more than four years in the commercial area and ran the normal hierarchy of positions until sales manager. It was there that he discovered his passion for people and decided to make a career change. Then, he earned a master's degree in Organizational Psychology from Columbia University, NY, to learn business at a leading institution. Upon returning to Brazil, he founded two companies and worked as an organizational consultant for a long time. But he found the challenge small and far from the impact he wanted to cause. It was at this moment that he met and became interested in the Arpex.
